body.p:
I send you a petition of Joseph R Logan asking the remission of a fine of $50 -- I know Mr Logan he is of one of the best famalies in the County, & is a gentleman, he has been wild he is now a sober man, The community would be gratified at you extending to him executive clemency, & I would regard it as a special favor to me,
Please send me the remission if you conclude to grant it,
